ygData.subject: Mallet Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: PLS someone. Help me! I am trying to finger out this Quest with the mallet in befallen. How many pieces are there? whjo do i give them to? ... one of ... in
ygData.messageBody:
PLS someone. Help me!

I am trying to finger out this Quest with the mallet in befallen. How
many pieces are there? whjo do i give them to?


>From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: "'shadowknight@onelist.com'" <shadowknight@onelist.com>
>Subject: [shadowknight] Re: Quests
>Date: Fri, 23 Apr 1999 15:08:08 -0400
>
>From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>
>*Have any of you done the message to Freeport yet. I talked with
one of
>*the Guild Masters in Neriak and he gave me a quest to talk to a spy
in
>*Freeport. I have been Freeport and even in the guild....and I
>*can't seem
>*to find the guy I'm looking for...maybe I have the wrong name
>*written down
>*or something....Anyone else ever do this quest?
>
>I don't recall the details offhand but if it's the one to give to
Opal, she
>is out after dark, I believe. Time of day makes a difference as to
where
>the NPC's are.
